akn:section.akn:heading: Authorization of appropriations for newborn screening programs and activities

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 300b–16. Authorization of appropriations for newborn screening programs and activities There are authorized to be appropriated—(1) to carry out sections 300b–8, 300b–9, 300b–10, and 300b–11 of this title, $11,900,000 for each of fiscal years 2015 through 2019; and
(2) to carry out section 300b–12 of this title, $8,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2015 through 2019.
(July 1, 1944, ch. 373, title XI, § 1117, as added Pub. L. 113–240, § 10, Dec. 18, 2014, 128 Stat. 2856.)
(1) to carry out sections 300b–8, 300b–9, 300b–10, and 300b–11 of this title, $11,900,000 for each of fiscal years 2015 through 2019; and
(2) to carry out section 300b–12 of this title, $8,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2015 through 2019.
